task.title: Add Images to a Poll
task.shortdesc: Add visual interest to your poll by adding images.

step.cmd: Click the icon to the right of your question or answers.
Drag and drop the image into the window provided or use Filepicker to select an image from Instagram, Flickr, Dropbox, or one of the other providers listed.
Click Save to add the image to your Poll.
Hover over the image for the question or choice and click the icons displayed to crop, delete, or replace the image.
